extendedInfo.description: Memory for Kids Game.Let's play this colorful memory game that helps kids improving memory ability.The game contains 6 levels. Alphabet, figures, animals, bells, fish and fruits.Find the same pictures in the grids. Press next level and new set of images will appear.This is an educational, engaging and entertaining game for children.Funny music and sounds accompany the game.

reviews.title: Ads are inappropriate for kids!!!!
reviews.comment: The game was fine but the ad at the bottom (which the child can easily click on) shows female nudity!!!!! Very inappropriate for my 2 yr old boy! Really?!?!
reviews.author: A Google User
